Posts.Content: Nov 7, 2014 10:09PM sandiesau wrote: I would bet your problem with brain fog is due to the tomoxifin and not the radiation . My brain fog got so bad along with some other pretty nasty side effects my oncologist switched me to exemestane instead of the tomoxifin. Eight months so far and feeling pretty good overall. I hope this helps with your brain fog Sandi
Posts.Title: Summer 2013 Rads Wildlyshel sandiesau

Posts.Content: sandiesau wrote: hi everyone        .after taking tomoxafin and then letrozole and having to quit after 6 months due to severe migraines and other unmanageable side effects my oncologist now has me on aromasin....so far so good other than a few tolerable side effects. Is anyone else on exemastane[aromasin} and how are you doing with side effects. I would love to hear from you.  thanks a million   Sandi Log in to post a reply
